name: Peak Finance
description: Peak Finance is a protocol designed to maintain the $PEAK token to the value of $METIS. This process is known as seigniorage, WHAT IS SEIGNIORAGE? The difference between the cost to produce money and its current value. Governments and Corporations make significant profits through seigniorage. WHY IS IT IMPORTANT? Governments and financial institutions make significant profits through seigniorage but there are no measures to guide itâ€™s production. This is where Peak Finance comes in, allowing YOU to profit from participating in seigniorage. METIS DAO For any asset to have value it must be pegged to another asset of value. With this in mind Peak Finance have chosen to peg to $METIS.
